description.narrative: CA Ireland 2019-2021 allocation from Irish Aid's Humanitarian Programme Plan (HPP). There are 5 x 36 mth projects under the HPP: South Kivu, DRC; Unity State, South Sudan; Makamba & Rumonge Provinces, Burundi and Bekaa region, Lebanon and Myanmar. The HPP provides funding for protracted, predictable and recurring humanitarian crises. The projects address the short and longer-term needs of conflict-affected populations, with a particular focus on gender and protection.

mailing-address.narrative: Christian Aid, 35-41 Lower Marsh, London SE1 7RL, United Kingdom

sector.code: EMERGENCY RESPONSE – WATER, SANITATION AND HYGIENE

description.narrative: Internal allocation from income source to partner project
